function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"OpenKG-COVID19 not being updated daily","Impact":"Inconvenience for downstream tasks due to outdated information","Mitigation":"Increase update frequency and automate data updating processes","Technologies":"Automated data updating tools and real-time data integration systems","People":"Users of OpenKG-COVID19 data","Owner":"Data administrators and managers"},{"Description":"Small number of samples for property evaluation in OpenKG-COVID19","Impact":"Less reliable evaluation result for the data quality","Mitigation":"Implement a new method to sample more triples of each property","Technologies":"New sampling techniques and data quality assessment tools","People":"Data quality assessors and evaluators","Owner":"Data quality improvement team"}]}
